name: Reapling
description:
A Metroidvania-in-progress about a young reapling who has been chosen to succeed the greatest reaper of all: Death.

Most assets are 3D assets that were rendered out in 2D along with their animations.

Currently planned fixes for after the game jam ends:
- Music exists but didn't properly implement during the jam
- The player is currently invincible, so even when the player's health reaches zero there is no death sequence in place and the game continues (although planned health pickups also are not implemented so this balances out for the purposes of the jam)
- There are more narrative beats that will be implemented in the future
- There will be seven (eight?) fully fleshed out worlds to explore, each with their own flavour

Much more is currently planned and the hope is that development will continue into the new year. In the meantime, please enjoy and let us know what you think!
